title.narrative: F.a: Regional Coordination and Capacity Building Programme

description.narrative: The programme aims to increase the capacity of project teams and partners to carry out development projects. The programme coordinates the development cooperation projects in the region. It aims to strengthen monitoring and evaluation procedures, increase networking among partners and relevant stakeholders, provide necessary human resource management and support to expatriate staff in the region and strengthen the competence of project staff and partners in the fields of project cycle management, finance, a dministration and good governance. The programme also provides resources and support for partners to implement pilot interventions.
